data.name: Enable AC Charge Upper % Limit
data.validation: Value must be either true or false

data.name: Enable Eco Mode
data.validation: Value must be either true or false

data.name: AC Charge 2 Start Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: AC Charge 2 End Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: DC Discharge 2 Start Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: DC Discharge 2 End Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: Inverter Max Output Active Power Percent
data.validation: Value must be between 0 and 100

data.name: DC Discharge 1 Start Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: DC Discharge 1 End Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: Enable DC Discharge
data.validation: Value must be either true or false

data.name: AC Charge 1 Start Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: AC Charge 1 End Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: AC Charge Enable
data.validation: Value must be either true or false

data.name: Battery Reserve % Limit
data.validation: Value must be between 4 and 100

data.name: Battery Charge Power
data.validation: Value must be between 0 and 3600

data.name: Battery Discharge Power
data.validation: Value must be between 0 and 3600

data.name: Battery Cutoff % Limit
data.validation: Value must be between 4 and 100

data.name: AC Charge Upper % Limit
data.validation: Value must be between 0 and 100

data.name: Restart Inverter
data.validation: Value can only be 100

data.name: Pause Battery
data.validation: Value must be one of: 0, 1, 2, 3 (Not Paused, Pause Charge, Pause Discharge, Pause Charge & Discharge)

data.name: Pause Battery Start Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: Pause Battery End Time
data.validation: Value format should be HH:mm. Use correct time range for hour and minutes

data.name: Force Off Grid
data.validation: Value must be either true or false

data.name: Export Power Priority
data.validation: Value must be one of: 0, 1, 2 (Load First, Battery First, Grid First)

data.name: Battery Charge Power Percentage
data.validation: Value must be between 1 and 100

data.name: Battery Discharge Power Percentage
data.validation: Value must be between 1 and 100

data.name: Enable EPS
data.validation: Value must be either true or false
